text:
Subject: Donation Inquiry

Dear Professor Lee,

I am interested in donating $25,000 USD to the Department of Computer Science at Maple University. I would like the funds to go towards student support for students in the Actuarial Mathematics - Business program.

My preferred payment method is PayPal. Please let me know the next steps. You can contact me at sarah.johnson@donor.net.

Cheers,
Sarah Johnson

Subject: Donation Inquiry

Dear Dr. Taylor,

I am interested in donating $20,000 CAD to the Department of Computer Science at Greenfield Institute. I would like the funds to go towards endowment fund for students in the Mechanical Engineering program.

My preferred payment method is wire transfer. Please let me know the next steps. You can contact me at david.brown@email.com.

Thanks,
David Brown

Subject: Donation Inquiry

Dear Professor Lee,

I am interested in donating $25,000 USD to the Faculty of Engineering at Greenfield Institute. I would like the funds to go towards scholarship for students in the Environmental Studies program.

My preferred payment method is PayPal. Please let me know the next steps. You can contact me at sarah.johnson@donor.net.

Best regards,
Sarah Johnson

Emily Carter

I am interested in donating $15,000 GBP to the Clayton H. Riddell Faculty of Environment, Earth, and Resources at St. Andrew’s College. I would like the funds to go towards endowment fund for students in the Mechanical Engineering program.

My preferred payment method is wire transfer. Please let me know the next steps. You can contact me at david.brown@supporters.org.

Thanks,
David Brown
